about_the_game:
Decurion is a fast-paced, old-school top-down shooter that demands skill, precision, and tactical thinking.

Your mission: Eliminate all enemies, stay alive, and protect your base.

Chain kill streaks, execute melee takedowns, and clear levels quickly to earn extra points. Spend your points between rounds on various upgrades to increase your odds of survival, as the levels will become more challenging.

Choose Your Mech and Pilot

Each mech and pilot has a unique ability that you can combine. Find the perfect pair that suits your playstyle.

Power-Ups

Collect temporary enhancements to become even stronger, but beware—enemies can power up too!

Anomalies That Disrupt the Fight

No two rounds play the same. Anomalies change gravity, enemy behavior, and the entire environment, forcing you to rethink your tactics on the fly.

Destructible Environments

The battlefield is destructible and thus dynamic. How you shape it will determine your survival.

One Shot, One Kill

Precision is key! Enemies go down fast, but so do you—master positioning and quick reflexes to stay in the fight.

Solo or Co-Op Mode

Play solo or team up with a friend in couch co-op. Tackle challenges, invent new strategies, and in the end, see who comes out on top!

short_description: A one-shot, one-kill shooter where you have to defend your base and stay alive. Utilize the destructible level environment and power-ups to eliminate enemies, survive dangerous anomalies, and progress through the levels. Play solo or team up with a friend in local co-op.
